Mailing Address: PO Box 9705 Prov GovtVictoria, BC     V8W 9S1
Service Details: - The Adoption Reunion Registry has a legislated mandate to provide search, intermediary, and support services to those whose lives have been affected by a BC adoption- The website will tell you about our services, outline step-by-step instructions for registering with us, and provide you with useful adoption-related information and links
Eligibility: Ages: 19 year(s) and up- Adoptees 19 years of age or older who were adopted in BC, and are now interested in locating and contacting their pre-adoption family- Relinquished a child in BC and are now interested in having contact, where the adoptee is 19 years of age or older
